pr_title: #734 Modified CircuitBreaker to use clock to calculate duration

timeline.bodyText: it is not better to use Clock.systemDefaultZone() instead ?
timeline.author: Romeh

replies.bodyText:
I saw at few places where we have initialised Clock as above:
https://github.com/resilience4j/resilience4j/blob/master/resilience4j-circuitbreaker/src/main/java/io/github/resilience4j/circuitbreaker/internal/CircuitBreakerStateMachine.java#L94
https://github.com/resilience4j/resilience4j/blob/master/resilience4j-circuitbreaker/src/main/java/io/github/resilience4j/circuitbreaker/internal/CircuitBreakerStateMachine.java#L126
Hence I kept it the same. Let me know your thoughts.

replies.bodyText: I think for measuring only a duration the timezone plays no role.
